amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide assistance to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 232 (Roll no. 494).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 232 (Roll no. 494).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
